Barber and Gertler ( 38) also reported positive impact of Oportunidades on nutritional 
outcomes in 2008. They found a significantly higher birthweight of 127.3 g in programme 
beneficiaries and a 4.6 ppt reduction in LBW. When evaluated based on average beneficiary 
time, programme impact was 68.3 g, which was significant. Programme impact from cash 
received was not significa
